mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(boardCategory, title, content, member_userId) VALUES (#{boardCategory}, #{title}, #{content}, #{member_userId})
mapper.select: SELECT nickName FROM member WHERE userId = #{userId}
SELECT b.boardId, b.boardCategory, b.title, b.insertDatetime, m.nickName FROM board b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.member_userId = m.userId GROUP BY b.boardId ORDER BY b.boardId DESC
SELECT boardId, boardCategory, title, content, insertDatetime, member_userId FROM board WHERE boardId = #{boardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET boardCategory = #{boardCategory}, title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE boardId = #{boardId}
